thread.title: Remains of youngest saint arrives in Belleville
thread.title_full: Remains of youngest saint arrives in Belleville - KPTV - FOX 12

author: Adam McDonald, Online News Producer, KMOV
title: Remains of youngest saint arrives in Belleville
text:
BELLEVILLE, Ill. (KMOV.com) â€“ Thousands of people are expected to come to downtown Belleville to view the remains of the youngest person to ever become a saint.
St. Maria Goretti was only 11-years-old when she was killed and she forgave her killer shortly before she died. She was canonized in 1950.
The relic is on display from 7 p.m. until 11 p.m. at the Cathedral of Saint Peter. A mass will be celebrated in her honor at 7 p.m.
The relic is halfway through a tour that takes it through 58 cities in 57 days.
